orbitEngine

Class Body

  • java.lang.Object
    • orbitEngine.Vector3d
      • orbitEngine.Body
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Body
extends Vector3d
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Represents the essential information that characterize a body
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Roberto Lanuza rolf2000@gmail.com

    • Field Detail

      • nextIndex

        static int nextIndex
        Next index for a new body. Useful when some bodies merges in a new one and we need hide merged bodies and create a new one.

      • index

        private int index
        Index of the body used to let us indexed access.

      • name

        java.lang.String name
        Name of the body e.g: "Earth".

      • mass

        double mass
        Mass of the body in Kg.

      • G_UNIVERSAL

        private static final double G_UNIVERSAL
        Gravitational constant G. Units m^3/(Kg*s^2).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • g_mass

        double g_mass
        Mass of the body in Kg multiplied by Gravitational constant G. Units m^3/s^2.

      • radius

        double radius
        Average radius of the body. Units m.

      • color

        java.awt.Color color
        Color user to represent this body on screen.

      • vx

        double vx
        Axis speed: v(t)= d(r(t))/dt

        Axis speed: v(t)= d(r(t))/dt

        Axis speed: v(t)= d(r(t))/dt

    • Constructor Detail

      • Body

        public Body(java.lang.String name,
            double mass,
            double radius,
            double x,
            double y,
            double z,
            double vx,
            double vy,
            double vz,
            java.awt.Color astroColor)
        Create a new standard body.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the body.
        radius - Average radius of the body. Unit m.
        mass - Body mass. Unit Kg.
        x - Position in axis x referenced to the Solar System barycenter. Unit m.
        y - Position in axis y referenced to the Solar System barycenter. Unit m.
        z - Position in axis z referenced to the Solar System barycenter. Unit m.
        vx - Speed in axis x. Unit m/s.
        vy - Speed in axis y. Unit m/s.
        vz - Speed in axis z. Unit m/s.
        astroColor - Color user to represent the body.

      • Body

        Body(java.lang.String name,
     double mass,
     double radius,
     java.awt.Color astroColor)
        Prepare an unallocated body. Necessary to add rockets to the constellation.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the body.
        radius - Average radius of the body. Unit m.
        mass - Body mass. Unit Kg.
        astroColor - Color user to represent the body.

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        protected java.lang.Object clone()
        Clone bodies to save and restore them in calculus avoiding restart constellation from initial position.
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a clone copy of the body.

      • kinetic

        public double kinetic()
        Kinetic energy of a body.
        Returns:
        Energy in Joule.

      • loadPosition

        public void loadPosition(Vector3d v3d)
        Load the position in axis (x,y,z) referenced to the Solar System barycenter.
        Parameters:
        v3d - new position in meters.

      • loadSpeed

        public void loadSpeed(Vector3d v3d)
        Load the speed in axis (x,y,z).
        Parameters:
        v3d - new speed in m/s.

      • loadGravity

        public void loadGravity(double gx,
                        double gy,
                        double gz)
        Load the gravity in axis (x,y,z).
        Parameters:
        gx - x axis gravity in m/s^2.
        gy - y axis gravity in m/s^2.
        gz - z axis gravity in m/s^2.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Give the name of the project
        Returns:
        name of this body

      • getRadius

        public double getRadius()
        Give the radius of the body
        Returns:
        radius in meters

      • getColor

        public java.awt.Color getColor()
        Give the color used to represent the body.
        Returns:
        Color

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        Give the index of the body used to let us indexed access. Useful when some bodies merges in a new one and we need hide merged bodies and create a new one.
        Returns:
        index of the body

      • getNextIndex

        public static int getNextIndex()
        Give the next index for a new body. Useful when some bodies merges in a new one and we need hide merged bodies and create a new one.
        Returns:
        index of the next new body
